statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT id, product_name, unit_price FROM Inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT id, product_name FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND unit_price < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE price > 10;
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, transaction_type, quantity_changed FROM StockTransactions WHERE quantity_changed < 0;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price <= 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, transaction_type, quantity_changed, transaction_date FROM StockTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND quantity_changed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, unit_price FROM inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT sh.product_id, sh.previous_quantity, sh.current_quantity, sc.change_quantity FROM stock_history sh JOIN stock_changes sc ON sh.product_id = sc.product_id ORDER BY sh.change_timestamp ASC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, s.contact_person, s.email, COUNT(sc.change_id) AS total_changes FROM suppliers s LEFT JOIN stock_changes sc ON s.supplier_id = sc.product_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name HAVING total_changes > 5 ORDER BY total_changes DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM warehouses;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory_items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < 10 OR quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, warehouse_name, quantity_changed FROM inventory_items JOIN stock_transactions ON inventory_items.item_id = stock_transactions.item_id ORDER BY quantity_changed DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
